thread.title: Parlec Announces Opening of New West Coast Warehouse in Anaheim, CA
thread.title_full: Parlec Announces Opening of New West Coast Warehouse in Anaheim, CA

author: Lauren Sformo
title: Parlec Announces Opening of New West Coast Warehouse in Anaheim, CA
text:
Parlec Inc. a worldwide leader in tooling and presetting solutions is pleased to announce the opening of a new West Coast warehouse in Anaheim, California. “Parlec’s increasing growth on the West Coast has made it necessary to expand into additional warehouse space,” said Mark Higgins, Executive Vice President. “The new warehouse will allow us to expand inventory and fulfill orders to the Western states with a greater level of efficiency.”
West Coast customers can now expect orders in one to two days in additional to a reduction in freight expenses. Customer pick ups will be available at both warehouse locations.
Parlec, Inc., ( http://www.parlec.com ) a worldwide leader in tooling and presetting solutions, offers more than 60 years of experience in CNC tooling innovation. Products include solutions for high performance toolholding, modular production boring, tapping, and tool measuring and inspection. Parlec’s portfolio comprises more than 8,000 individual products - 98% of them manufactured in the USA at its Fairport, New York world headquarters. Parlec has more than 30 patented processes and technologies and offers unmatched levels of technology, quality, and support on a global basis with sales, engineering, manufacturing, and service throughout North America, Europe and Asia.
